name: Kingdoms of Ekulera
description:
How To Play

A - Recruit Army
W - Upgrade Settlements
Arrow Keys - Move (Double tap to attack)

Use arrow keys to move around , Press A to bolster your armies if the land have enough manpower , When you are near the castle press w to level up your castle for more protection.  If you lose a battle or Tax the land too much you will lose Loyalty and if you lose all your loyality you will lose the game

Music used : "Adventure Meme" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Crown Image Used: http://seanwarton.com/pixel-art-crown/
